alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 28 at 5:06AM AKDT until March 28 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with brief blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 1 inch. Winds gusting as high to 40 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Northeastern Brooks Range near Passes. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT today. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Blowing snow reducing visibility to one quarter mile or less at times. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds and periods of low visibility in blowing snow will continue in passes this morning. The strongest winds and lowest visibility will be in passes. Winds will diminish this afternoon and conditions will improve then.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
